# [Interview #1096: Orem Signing Report - mail-mi, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1096#5)

#### mail-mi

How easy would it be to pull metal through [a Reod Elantrian]?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Pull metal out of them.... Easi-
*er*
.

#### mail-mi

Easier than a regular human?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
